scripts.download-and-generate: npm run download-spec && npm run generate
scripts.download-and-generate-local: npm run download-spec-local && npm run generate
scripts.download-spec-local: curl http://localhost:3333/openapi.json > openapi.json && npm run format-openapi
scripts.full-update: npm run download-and-generate && npm run build
scripts.full-update-local: npm run download-and-generate-local && npm run build
scripts.generate: npm run clean-swagger && npm run openapi-preprocess && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i temp/openapi.json -g typescript-fetch -t ./generator-tpl -o ./src/swagger && npm run format
scripts.lint: npm run format:check && eslint --ignore-path .gitignore ./src && npx sort-package-json package.json
scripts.openapi-generator-extract-templates: npx openapi-generator-cli author template -g typescript-fetch -o generator-tpl
